name: Patient Strike
text: Your training under the Master of Swords has taught you that a well-timed strike is worth waiting for and that patience will serve you well in the long run.
benefit: You can choose to ready an attack as a fullround action instead of a standard action. When you do so, you gain a +2 bonus on your attack roll when your readied action triggers.
normal: Readying an attack is a standard action and doesn’t grant a bonus on your attack roll.
text_zh: 你受训于剑术大师的经历告诉你：为了一次恰到好处的打击，等待是值得的，而这种耐心会使你受益终生。
benefit_zh: 你可以以一个整轮动作而非一次标准动作进行一次准备攻击。如果你这样做，在准备动作触发时，你获得+2的攻击加值。
normal_zh: 以准备动作进行攻击是一次标准动作，而且不会在攻击骰获得任何加值。
